headline: Amentum: Forgotten Spin-Off In Defense And Nuclear Energy
summary: Amentum, a recent spin-off, combines legacy Amentum and Jacobs CMS, focusing on defense, space, intelligence, and nuclear engineering, with a $5 billion market cap. Read more here.
